name: Smart Gallery DBGT
author: Kapsule Network

sections.description:
ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· FRENCH ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· â¡ï¸ Pour afficher une gallerie d’image intelligente, insÃ©rez tout simplement le shortcode suivant Ã  l’endroit oÃ¹ vous le dÃ©sirez :

[smartgallery_dbgt keyword=’% MOT CLE %’ number=’% 1 – 9 %’]

Saisissez dans le paramÃ¨tre %keyword% la thÃ©matique des images que vous souhaitez afficher et dans le paramÃ¨tre %number% le nombre d’images dÃ©sirÃ©.

/!\ 3rd Party /!\

Vous avez le choix entre 2 bibliothÃ¨ques d’images qui sont totalement indÃ©pendantes de ce plugin :

  • https://pixabay.com/

  • https://www.flickr.com/

La modÃ©ration du contenu, et la gestion du droit d’auteur quant aux images fournies par leur API leur incombe Ã  100%. Ce plugin ne propose aucune image et ne fait que se connecter Ã  leur API.

Merci de consulter leur politique de confidentialitÃ© et leur CGU.

  • https://pixabay.com/api/docs/
  • https://pixabay.com/fr/service/terms/
  • https://www.flickr.com/services/api/
  • https://www.flickr.com/help/terms/api

ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ ENGLISH ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸

â¡ï¸ In order to display smart image gallery, simply insert the following shortcode where you want it:

[smartgallery_dbgt keyword = ‘% KEYWORD %’ number = ‘% 1 – 9 %’]

Enter in the %keyword % parameter the theme of the images you want to display and in the %number% parameter the desired number of images.

/!\ 3rd Party /!\

You have the choice between 2 image libraries which are completely independent of this plugin:

  • https://pixabay.com/
  • https://www.flickr.com/

The moderation of the content, and the management of the copyright for the images provided by their API is 100% their responsibility. This plugin does not offer any images and only connects to their API.
Please consult their privacy policy and T & Cs

  • https://pixabay.com/api/docs/
  • https://pixabay.com/fr/service/terms/
  • https://www.flickr.com/services/api/
  • https://www.flickr.com/help/terms/api
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/smart-gallery-dbgt directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Set yours preferences.
  4. Insert the contact form where you want with the shortcode or with the included widget, either directly in your articles / pages, or directly in your theme.

.::: EXPLICATIONS EN FRANCAIS :::.

  2. Activez le plugin via l’Ã©cran “Extensions” de WordPress
  3. ParamÃ©trez vos prÃ©fÃ©rences.
  4. InsÃ©rez le formulaire de contact oÃ¹ vous voulez avec le shortcode du plugin ou le widget intÃ©grÃ©, soit directement dans vos articles/pages, soit directement dans votre theme.
sections.faq:
This plugin is really light?

YES lighter than that, it does not exist!

What is the shortcode ?

Free & PREMIUM Version
[smartgallery_dbgt keyword = ‘% Your Query %’ number = ‘% 1-10 %’ imagesize=’ %thumb/medium/large %’ legal=’ %Override General Rules = yes/yesbis/no %’]

â­ PREMIUM Version â­
[dbgtpremium id=’ 381233 ‘ alt=’% Image Title %’ url=’#’]

Flickr

Tirages Photos

Le saviez-vous ? Vous pouvez faire tirer vos photos gratuitement via des sites comme photo-gratuit.net

ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ ENGLISH ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ : Ultra light plugin to display a random image gallery based on the Flickr Â© / Pixabay Â© library by simply entering the keyword of your choice + the number of images to display. > The Pixabay Â© library is more complete and will allow images to be stored directly on your server, while the Flickr Â© library will work on Hotlinking.
